Package review.classdesign.jammy.addons

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ILanguageManager
    An ILanguageManager is in charge of managing problem solver execution by providing for a given problem, following features : Retrieving a valid project instance Retrieving a valid solver file Run a given solver file for a given output.
    ISolverRunner
    An ISolverRunner represents a solver execution for a given input.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractProcessManager  
    ProcessSolverRunner
